entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
